#sidebar TOC

= profilesearch =

List of author profiles.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*  || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| q       || required   || Search query string. ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

== Example: ==

Fetch search results in json format for author profiles that match Barack Obama.

{{{
$ curl -i "http://otter.topsy.com/profilesearch.json?q=Barack+Obama"

HTTP/1.0 200 OK
Connection: close
Date: Thu, 27 Aug 2009 04:12:03 GMT
Content-Length: 4475
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Expires: Wed, 26 Aug 2009 21:17:02 -0700
Status: 200
X-RateLimit-Limit: 2500
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 2495
X-RateLimit-Reset: 1251349200

{
   "request" : {
      "parameters" : {
         "q" : "Barack Obama"
      },
      "response_type" : "json",
      "resource" : "profilesearch",
      "url" : "http://otter.topsy.com/profilesearch.json?q=Barack+Obama"
   },
   "response" : {
      "page" : 1,
      "total" : "237",
      "perpage" : 10,
      "list" : [
         {
            "url" : "http://twitter.com/barackobama",
            "name" : "Barack Obama",
            "topsy_author_url" : "http://topsy.com/twitter/barackobama",
            "photo_url" : "http://a1.twimg.com/profile_images/219314140/obama_4color_omark_normal.jpg",
            "description" : "44th President of the United States",
            "influence_level" : "5"
         },
      ]
   }
}
}}}
